Articles.Content: I have a life support mod installed and would like to know how long it takes to get to Duna and back assuming optimal alignment.
I'm thinking around 80 or so days was my record(Don't hold me to that number). I would plan for more than that though.

Usually in the area of 100-120 days with a Munar assist from LKO, I think.

Although one time I overshot Jool and spent 18 years cycling back to Duna- I kid you not.

Getting to Duna takes about 75 days, then you'll have to wait for (I can't remember how long) for the launch window to get back. The return trip takes another 74 days. These are for Hohmann transfers, but if you want to use more delta-v, you can shorten the time significantly.
